channel.title: Please help me with legacy 614
channel.description:
i got a problem when i run legacy 614 source its says:
[17:27:07] [Server] Connecting to vote4tokens database Class not found exception No suitable driver found for jbdc:mysql://www.legacy614.org:3306/legacy_vote Unable to connect to MySQL press any key to continue. . .
do anyone know what i need to do?

item.title: Please help me with legacy 614
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

You need to make your own SQL database and adjust the variables to match your database. It is currently trying to connect to Legacyâ€™s database.

Read full topic
